00119 UINT32      IntroScreenInit( void )
00120 {
00121       //Set so next time we come in, we can set up
00122       gfIntroScreenEntry = TRUE;
00123 
00124       return( 1 );
00125 }

00128 UINT32      IntroScreenShutdown( void )
00129 {
00130       return( 1 );

00133 
00134 UINT32      IntroScreenHandle( void )
00135 {
00136       if( gfIntroScreenEntry )
00137       {
00138             EnterIntroScreen();
00139             gfIntroScreenEntry = FALSE;
00140             gfIntroScreenExit = FALSE;
00141 
00142             InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00143       }
00144 
00145       RestoreBackgroundRects();
00146 
00147 
00148       GetIntroScreenUserInput();
00149 
00150       HandleIntroScreen();
00151 
00152       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
00153       EndFrameBufferRender();
00154 
00155 
00156       if( gfIntroScreenExit )
00157       {
00158             ExitIntroScreen();
00159             gfIntroScreenExit = FALSE;
00160             gfIntroScreenEntry = TRUE;
00161       }
00162 
00163       return( guiIntroExitScreen );
00164 }

00166 
00167 BOOLEAN EnterIntroScreen()
00168 {
00169       INT32 iFirstVideoID = -1;
00170 
00171       ClearMainMenu();
00172 
00173 
00174       SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
00175 
00176       // Don't play music....
00177       SetMusicMode( MUSIC_NONE );
00178 
00179 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00180       if( FileExists( "..\\NoIntro.txt" ) )
00181       {
00182             PrepareToExitIntroScreen();
00183             return( TRUE );
00184       }
00185 #endif
00186 
00187       //if the library doesnt exist, exit
00188       if( !IsLibraryOpened( LIBRARY_INTRO ) )
00189       {
00190             PrepareToExitIntroScreen();
00191             return( TRUE );
00192       }
00193 
00194       //initialize smacker
00195       SmkInitialize( ghWindow, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
00196 
00197 
00198       //get the index opf the first video to watch
00199       iFirstVideoID = GetNextIntroVideo( SMKINTRO_FIRST_VIDEO );
00200 
00201       if( iFirstVideoID != -1 )
00202       {
00203             StartPlayingIntroFlic( iFirstVideoID );
00204 
00205             guiIntroExitScreen = INTRO_SCREEN;
00206       }
00207 
00208       //Got no intro video, exit
00209       else
00210       {
00211             PrepareToExitIntroScreen();
00212       }
00213       
00214 
00215       return( TRUE );
00216 }

00224 
00225       //shutdown smaker
00226       SmkShutdown();

00228 
00229 void HandleIntroScreen()
00230 {
00231       BOOLEAN     fFlicStillPlaying = FALSE;
00232 
00233       //if we are exiting this screen, this frame, dont update the screen
00234       if( gfIntroScreenExit )
00235             return;
00236 
00237 
00238       //handle smaker each frame
00239       fFlicStillPlaying = SmkPollFlics();
00240 
00241       //if the flic is not playing
00242       if( !fFlicStillPlaying )
00243       {
00244             INT32 iNextVideoToPlay = -1;
00245 
00246             iNextVideoToPlay = GetNextIntroVideo( giCurrentIntroBeingPlayed );
00247 
00248             if( iNextVideoToPlay != -1 )
00249             {
00250                   StartPlayingIntroFlic( iNextVideoToPlay );
00251             }
00252             else
00253             {
00254                   PrepareToExitIntroScreen();
00255                   giCurrentIntroBeingPlayed = -1;
00256             }
00257       }
00258 
00259       InvalidateScreen();
00260 }

00263 
00264 void        GetIntroScreenUserInput()
00265 {
00266       InputAtom Event;
00267       POINT  MousePos;
00268 
00269 
00270       GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
00271 
00272       while( DequeueEvent( &Event ) )
00273       {
00274             // HOOK INTO MOUSE HOOKS
00275             switch( Event.usEvent)
00276         {
00277                   case LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00278                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00279                         break;
00280                   case LEFT_BUTTON_UP:
00281                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y ,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);               
00282                         break;
00283                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00284                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00285                         break;
00286                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_UP: 
00287                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);   
00288                         break;
00289                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_REPEAT: 
00290                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_REPEAT, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);                 
00291                         break;
00292                   case LEFT_BUTTON_REPEAT: 
00293                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_REPEAT, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);                        
00294                         break;
00295             }
00296 
00297 
00298             if( Event.usEvent == KEY_UP )
00299             {
00300                   switch( Event.usParam )
00301                   {
00302                         case ESC:
00303                               PrepareToExitIntroScreen();
00304                               break;
00305                         case SPACE:
00306                               SmkCloseFlic( gpSmackFlic );
00307                               break;
00308 
00309 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00310 
00311                         case 'r':
00312                               break;
00313 
00314                         case 'i':
00315                               InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00316                               break;
00317 
00318 #endif
00319                   }
00320             }
00321       }
00322 
00323       // if the user presses either mouse button
00324       if( gfLeftButtonState || gfRightButtonState )
00325       {
00326             //advance to the next flic
00327             SmkCloseFlic( gpSmackFlic );
00328       }
00329 }
00330 
00331 
00332 void PrepareToExitIntroScreen()
00333 {
00334       //if its the intro at the begining of the game
00335       if( gbIntroScreenMode == INTRO_BEGINING )
00336       {
00337             //go to the init screen
00338             guiIntroExitScreen = INIT_SCREEN;
00339       }
00340       else if( gbIntroScreenMode == INTRO_SPLASH )
00341       {
00342             //display a logo when exiting
00343             DisplaySirtechSplashScreen();
00344 
00345             gfDoneWithSplashScreen = TRUE;
00346             guiIntroExitScreen = INIT_SCREEN;
00347       }
00348       else
00349       {
00350             //We want to reinitialize the game
00351             ReStartingGame();
00352 
00353 //          guiIntroExitScreen = MAINMENU_SCREEN;
00354             guiIntroExitScreen = CREDIT_SCREEN;
00355       }
00356 
00357       gfIntroScreenExit = TRUE;
00358 }
00359 
00360 
00361 INT32 GetNextIntroVideo( UINT32 uiCurrentVideo )
00362 {
00363       INT32 iStringToUse = -1;
00364 
00365       //switch on whether it is the beginging or the end game video
00366       switch( gbIntroScreenMode )
00367       {
00368             //the video at the begining of the game
00369             case INTRO_BEGINING:
00370             {
00371                   switch( uiCurrentVideo )
00372                   {
00373                         case SMKINTRO_FIRST_VIDEO:
00374                               iStringToUse = SMKINTRO_REBEL_CRDT;
00375                               break;
00376                         case SMKINTRO_REBEL_CRDT:
00377                               iStringToUse = SMKINTRO_OMERTA;
00378                               break;
00379                         case SMKINTRO_OMERTA:
00380                               iStringToUse = SMKINTRO_PRAGUE_CRDT;
00381                               break;
00382                         case SMKINTRO_PRAGUE_CRDT:
00383                               iStringToUse = SMKINTRO_PRAGUE;
00384                               break;
00385                         case SMKINTRO_PRAGUE:
00386                               iStringToUse = -1;
00387                               break;
00388 //                      case SMKINTRO_LAST_INTRO:
00389 //                            iStringToUse = -1;
00390 //                            break;
00391                   }
00392             }
00393             break;
00394 
00395             //end game
00396             case INTRO_ENDING:
00397             {
00398                   switch( uiCurrentVideo )
00399                   {
00400                         case SMKINTRO_FIRST_VIDEO:
00401                               //if Miguel is dead, play the flic with out him in it
00402                               if( gMercProfiles[ MIGUEL ].bMercStatus == MERC_IS_DEAD )
00403                                     iStringToUse = SMKINTRO_END_END_SPEECH_NO_MIGUEL;
00404                               else
00405                                     iStringToUse = SMKINTRO_END_END_SPEECH_MIGUEL;
00406                               break;
00407 
00408                         case SMKINTRO_END_END_SPEECH_MIGUEL:
00409                         case SMKINTRO_END_END_SPEECH_NO_MIGUEL:
00410                               iStringToUse = SMKINTRO_END_HELI_FLYBY;
00411                               break;
00412 
00413                         //if SkyRider is dead, play the flic without him
00414                         case SMKINTRO_END_HELI_FLYBY:
00415                               if( gMercProfiles[ SKYRIDER ].bMercStatus == MERC_IS_DEAD )
00416                                     iStringToUse = SMKINTRO_END_NOSKYRIDER_HELICOPTER;
00417                               else
00418                                     iStringToUse = SMKINTRO_END_SKYRIDER_HELICOPTER;
00419                               break;
00420                   }
00421             }
00422             break;
00423 
00424             case INTRO_SPLASH:
00425                   switch( uiCurrentVideo )
00426                   {
00427                         case SMKINTRO_FIRST_VIDEO:
00428                               iStringToUse = SMKINTRO_SPLASH_SCREEN;
00429                               break;
00430                         case SMKINTRO_SPLASH_SCREEN:
00431                               //iStringToUse = SMKINTRO_SPLASH_TALONSOFT;
00432                               break;
00433                   }
00434                   break;
00435       }
00436 
00437       return( iStringToUse );
00438 }

00440 
00441 void StartPlayingIntroFlic( INT32 iIndexOfFlicToPlay )
00442 {
00443 
00444       if( iIndexOfFlicToPlay != -1 )
00445       {
00446             //start playing a flic
00447             gpSmackFlic = SmkPlayFlic( gpzSmackerFileNames[ iIndexOfFlicToPlay ], (SCREEN_WIDTH-640)/2, (SCREEN_HEIGHT-480)/2, TRUE );
00448 
00449             if( gpSmackFlic != NULL )
00450             {
00451                   giCurrentIntroBeingPlayed = iIndexOfFlicToPlay;
00452             }
00453             else
00454             {
00455                   //do a check
00456 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00457                   PrepareToExitIntroScreen();
00458 #else
00459 
00460                   DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( gzIntroScreen[INTRO_TXT__CANT_FIND_INTRO], MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, CDromEjectionErrorMessageBoxCallBack );
00461 #endif
00462             }
00463       }
00464 }

00466 
00467 void SetIntroType( INT8 bIntroType )
00468 {
00469       if( bIntroType == INTRO_BEGINING )
00470       {
00471             gbIntroScreenMode = INTRO_BEGINING;
00472       }
00473       else if( bIntroType == INTRO_ENDING )
00474       {
00475             gbIntroScreenMode = INTRO_ENDING;
00476       }
00477       else if( bIntroType == INTRO_SPLASH )
00478       {
00479             gbIntroScreenMode = INTRO_SPLASH;
00480       }
00481 }

00484 void DisplaySirtechSplashScreen()
00485 {
00486   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00487   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00488       UINT32 uiLogoID;
00489 
00490       UINT32                                                             uiDestPitchBYTES;
00491       UINT8                                                              *pDestBuf;
00492 
00493 
00494       // CLEAR THE FRAME BUFFER
00495       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
00496       memset(pDestBuf, 0, SCREEN_HEIGHT * uiDestPitchBYTES );
00497       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
00498 
00499 
00500       memset( &VObjectDesc, 0, sizeof( VOBJECT_DESC ) );
00501       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00502       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\SirtechSplash.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00503 
00504 //    FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\TShold.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00505       if( !AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiLogoID) )
00506       {     
00507             AssertMsg( 0, String( "Failed to load %s", VObjectDesc.ImageFile ) );
00508             return;
00509       }
00510 
00511       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, uiLogoID);
00512       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,(SCREEN_WIDTH-640)/2, (SCREEN_HEIGHT-480)/2, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00513       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(uiLogoID);
00514 
00515 
00516       InvalidateScreen();
00517       RefreshScreen( NULL );
00518 }
